body.p:
The Component Dependencies view allows you to spot the dependencies for the selected component of an XML Schema, a Relax NG schema, a NVDL schema or an XSLT stylesheet. You can open the view from Window Show View Component Dependencies
Window Show View Other oXygen Component Dependencies .

The action is available for all named components (for example elements or attributes). Component Dependencies View - Hierarchy for xhtml11.xsd
Component Dependencies View - Hierarchy for xhtml11.xsd
In the Component Dependencies view the following actions are available in the toolbar:

dlentry.dd: Allows you to configure a search scope to compute the dependencies structure.
Contains a list of previously executed dependencies computations.

body.p: The contextual menu contains the following actions:

dlentry.dd: Selects the first reference of the referenced component from the current selected component in the dependencies tree.
Shows the definition of the currently selected component in the dependencies tree.

body.note: If a component contains multiple references to another components, a small table is shown containing all these references. When a recursive reference is encountered, it is marked with a special icon .
